data.name: BRINK Traveler
data.description:
Travel to some of the world's most amazing natural wonders in fully immersive 3D to feel like you're really there! Step into a postcard with BRINK Traveler and visit some of the most breathtaking places on Earth today!

üèûÔ∏è Featuring:
‚Ä¢44 incredible spots to see across 28 locations
‚Ä¢Room-scale walkable area in each location (a few meters)
‚Ä¢Virtual guide & assistant to learn about locations
‚Ä¢Travel solo or with friends & family multiplayer
‚Ä¢Collect points of interest
‚Ä¢Shoot photos to share with friends
‚Ä¢Download only the locations you want (~500MB each)
‚Ä¢Free content updates with more locations to come
‚Ä¢Free Home Environment featuring Horseshoe Bend

üó∫Ô∏è Current Locations: 
Pulpit Rock, Norway | Horseshoe Bend | Aoraki / Mt Cook, New Zealand | Landmannalaugar, Iceland | Arches National Park | Navagio Beach, Greece | The Wave | Lone Pine Peak | Bardenas Reales, Spain | Ulsanbawi, South Korea | Antelope Canyon | Mount Sunday | White Pocket | Cirque de Gavarnie, France | Death Valley | Pena Ezkaurre, Spain | Bryce Canyon | Pilat Dune, France | Red Rock Canyon | Alabama Hills | Mount Whitney | Marseille, France | Goblin Valley | Mount Morrison | Glen Canyon | Crystal Crag | Singing Canyon | Haifoss, Iceland

üåé BRINK XR is also a proud member of 1% for the Planet. We donate a minimum of 1% of our total annual sales to charities focused on environmental protection to ensure the wonderful places of the world are preserved for future generations.

changelog.change_log:
v1.4.1 - Improvements & Fixes Update!

Improvements:
‚Ä¢ 35% render resolution increase on Quest 3 resulting in a much sharper experience all around!
‚Ä¢ AI Travel Assistant response latency reduced by more than 80% - nearly instantaneous responses now!
‚Ä¢ AI Travel Assistant has improved responses and information quality
‚Ä¢ Smoother hand movement while holding and interacting with objects, especially in Smooth movement mode.
‚Ä¢ New Korean and Chinese voice recordings for the tutorial and new locations.
‚Ä¢ Updated French, Italian, German, Spanish, and Japanese voice recordings for new locations.

Fixes:
‚Ä¢ Smooth Turning now correctly pivots around the user's center if they've moved by walking.
‚Ä¢ Aoraki's lake ice is now correctly lit in Night Mode.
‚Ä¢ Fixed a rare bug that would leave a player stuck after upgrading from v1.3.0 if the Virtual Guide was disabled.


v1.4.0 - BRINK Traveler Fall 2023 Update!

New Locations:
This release features eight new spectacular and mostly international locations, along with a full remaster of the crowd favorite The Wave!
‚Ä¢ Aoraki (Mt Cook): New Zealand's tallest peak, where snow kisses the azure sky.
‚Ä¢ Navagio Beach: Greece's secluded cove, cradling the iconic shipwrecked beauty.
‚Ä¢ Pe√±a Ezkaurre: Spain's rugged pinnacle, beckoning hikers with panoramic vistas.
‚Ä¢ Landmannalaugar: Iceland's geothermal wonder, painted in rainbow-colored rhyolite.
‚Ä¢ Banderas Reales: Spain's windswept highlands, where nature's majesty unfolds.
‚Ä¢ Red Rock State Park: California's hidden desert jewel, awash in vibrant earthen hues.
‚Ä¢ Marseille: France's sun-soaked port, alive with history and Mediterranean charm.
‚Ä¢ The Wave: Remastered with two new spots! Arizona's swirling desert masterpiece.

AI Travel Assistant:
‚Ä¢ Your very own AI-powered travel assistant is here! If you've ever wanted to learn even more about the amazing places you visit - just ask! Simply speak into your virtual walkie-talkie to ask your questions, and you travel assistant will respond with relevant contextual information spoken back to you.
‚Ä¢ We're introducing this as a beta feature for now as it only supports the English language, but we're eager to expand its capabilities and languages in future updates!

Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Quest 3 runs at 90FPS - the first of many Quest 3 optimizations to come!
‚Ä¢ Public multiplayer now groups people regardless of location they're currently in, making it much more likely to find others online.
‚Ä¢ Newly updated and improved introduction tutorial to be faster and clearer.
‚Ä¢ Three locations are now included in the initial download so users can start exploring faster.
‚Ä¢ Updated locations with additional plants and dynamic effects like a water shader.
‚Ä¢ Photo saving (which was broken by Meta Quest software update 56) has been fixed.

BRINK Traveler Fall 2023 Update! 

New Locations:
This release features eight new spectacular and mostly international locations, along with a full remaster of the crowd favorite The Wave! 
‚Ä¢ Aoraki (Mt Cook): New Zealand's tallest peak, where snow kisses the azure sky.
‚Ä¢ Navagio Beach: Greece's secluded cove, cradling the iconic shipwrecked beauty.
‚Ä¢ Pe√±a Ezkaurre: Spain's rugged pinnacle, beckoning hikers with panoramic vistas.
‚Ä¢ Landmannalaugar: Iceland's geothermal wonder, painted in rainbow-colored rhyolite.
‚Ä¢ Banderas Reales: Spain's windswept highlands, where nature's majesty unfolds.
‚Ä¢ Red Rock State Park: California's hidden desert jewel, awash in vibrant earthen hues.
‚Ä¢ Marseille: France's sun-soaked port, alive with history and Mediterranean charm.
‚Ä¢ The Wave: Remastered with two new spots! Arizona's swirling desert masterpiece. 

AI Travel Assistant:
‚Ä¢ Your very own AI-powered travel assistant is here! If you've ever wanted to learn even more about the amazing places you visit - just ask! Simply speak into your virtual walkie-talkie to ask your questions, and you travel assistant will respond with relevant contextual information spoken back to you.
‚Ä¢ We're introducing this as a beta feature for now as it only supports the English language, but we're eager to expand its capabilities and languages in future updates! 

General Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Quest 3 runs at 90FPS - the first of many Quest 3 optimizations to come!
‚Ä¢ Public multiplayer now groups people regardless of location they're currently in, making it much more likely to find others online.
‚Ä¢ Newly updated and improved introduction tutorial to be faster and clearer.
‚Ä¢ Three locations are now included in the initial download so users can start exploring faster.
‚Ä¢ Updated locations with additional plants and dynamic effects like a water shader.
‚Ä¢ Photo saving (which was broken by Meta Quest software update 56) has been fixed.

BRINK Traveler Winter 2022 Update!

New Locations:
‚Ä¢ This release marks the first batch of diverse and international locations we've been capturing!
‚Ä¢ Pulpit Rock in Norway features two breathtaking overlooks of iconic Norwegian cliffs and fjords.
‚Ä¢ Ulsanbawi in South Korea features the incredible sunrise majesty of Seoraksan National Park.
‚Ä¢ Mount Sunday in New Zealand features one of the most icon filming spots from Lord of the Rings.
‚Ä¢ Bryce Canyon in USA features two unique hoodoo-lined canyons of Navajo Stairs and Wall Street.
‚Ä¢ Sand Dune Arch in USA fills out the last featured natural arch hidden away in Arches National Park.
‚Ä¢ Pilat Dune in France is features a massive ocean-side dune surrounded by forests on all sides.

Social Multiplayer Improvements:
‚Ä¢ Cross-Platform Multiplayer - travel with friends and family regardless of the platform on Oculus Quest, Oculus Rift, and SteamVR (currently in beta!)
‚Ä¢ Easily find other users while connected to Public Mode by looking for player icons on Postcards.
‚Ä¢ Full face tracking is now supported for Quest Pro devices.
‚Ä¢ Crouching now works in Multiplayer.

General Improvements:
‚Ä¢ New 'sitting' mode option in settings to raise your height slightly to improve comfort for seated users.
‚Ä¢ Country markers for each postcard to easier identify where locations are worldwide.
‚Ä¢ Many bug fixes and optimizations.

BRINK Traveler Summer Update!

Social Multiplayer:
‚Ä¢ A whole Social Multiplayer experience - travel solo, or meet with friends and other explorers from across the world.
‚Ä¢ Public mode to randomly encounter other explorers as you travel from place to place.
‚Ä¢ Private mode to travel with friends and family as a group.
‚Ä¢ Meta Avatars integration - to bring your social presence into the experience.
‚Ä¢ Parties & Destinations support - invite and jump into an experience with friends right from your Home Environment.
‚Ä¢ This is our initial release of Multiplayer, so please report any issues encountered to contact@brinkxr.com - we'd love to hear your feedback!

New Locations Added:
‚Ä¢ Cirque de Gavarnie - a natural amphitheater in the beautiful French Pyrenees Mountains.
‚Ä¢ Lone Pine Peak - an Alpine climber‚Äôs heaven, with steep snowy peaks and breathtaking views.
‚Ä¢ Goblin Valley - an alien landscape covered in thousands of hoodoos nicknamed ‚ÄòGoblins‚Äô
‚Ä¢ Singing Canyon - a wide and deep slot canyon with renowned acoustics.

Asian Localization Added:
‚Ä¢ Text & Audio Narration localization for Japanese, Korean, and Chinese (Traditional & Simplified).

General Improvements
‚Ä¢ Camera selfie-mode when in multiplayer!
‚Ä¢ Camera wide-angle toggle.
‚Ä¢ Camera activation gestures now easier to trigger.
‚Ä¢ Easily access images you've taken in BRINK Traveler through your headset's Files app.
‚Ä¢ More 3D POI objects added throughout the experience.
‚Ä¢ Redesigned Watch UI with improved controller tracking.
‚Ä¢ Tips screens during location loading.
‚Ä¢ Texture compression improvements (sharper textures and better download sizes).
‚Ä¢ Improved visual effects like airplane trails and shooting stars.
‚Ä¢ Audio design improvements.

Misc News:
‚Ä¢ We've been busily scanning international locations and look forward to having many more coming soon!
‚Ä¢ Please welcome our talented new hires to the BRINK team - Danfung and Aaron!

BRINK Traveler Winter Update!

New Spots Added:
‚Ä¢ Corona Arch spot added to Arches location.
‚Ä¢ Mesquite Flat Dunes spot added to Death Valley South location.
‚Ä¢ Glen Canyon is a brand new location.

Localization Added:
‚Ä¢ Full subtitles throughout the experience.
‚Ä¢ Text & Audio Narration localization for English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.
‚Ä¢ Asian localization will be coming soon for Japanese, Korean, Chinese (Traditional & Simplified).

Locomotion & Experience Settings Expanded locomotion options:
‚Ä¢ Terrain-follow is now on by default, so any joystick movement will keep you level with the terrain.
‚Ä¢ Smooth, Step, and Snap modes for movement and turning. Step mode is now the default for best comfort.
‚Ä¢ Slow, Medium, and Fast speed for movement and turning.
‚Ä¢ Head or Hand based forward movement direction.
‚Ä¢ Enable or Disable movement acceleration.

Experience options:
‚Ä¢ Ability to skip the intro tutorial at any time by pressing in both joysticks for 5 seconds.
‚Ä¢ Enable or Disable subtitles.
‚Ä¢ Enable or Disable music.
‚Ä¢ Enable or Disable walkable boundary overlay.
‚Ä¢ Enable or Disable haptic feedback.
‚Ä¢ Ability to 'crouch' at any time by pressing in the joystick button.

Improved visual effects:
‚Ä¢ Realistic dynamic Sun glare that reacts to objects that pass in front of it.
‚Ä¢ Improved Night mode with realistic atmosphere and moon glow.
‚Ä¢ Waterfalls animation now reenabled on the Quest 1.
‚Ä¢ Very subtle cloud and stars movement.

DLC System improvements:
‚Ä¢ An overhauled download system which will enable smaller and more efficient downloads after this release. Those updating from 1.0 will need to re-download previous locations this once to sync with the new system (sorry, but there was no way around it!)
‚Ä¢ Points of Interest are now included with location downloads, for easier offline usage.

Bug Fixes:
‚Ä¢ Fixed instances where users could get stuck in the tutorial if the app was prematurely exited before completion.
‚Ä¢ Fixed instances where the watch would stop working if used within the first 5 seconds of traveling to a new location.

Misc News:
‚Ä¢ We're focusing on capturing more diverse / international locations this year!
‚Ä¢ Multiplayer is one of our most requested features, and it is our top priority for the next major release!
‚Ä¢ We're hiring talented travelers! Visit www.BrinkXR.com/careers for more info!

Initial Release of BRINK Traveler!

Brink's mission is to make the wonders of the World accessible to all through virtual travel experiences - and with your support and a bit of luck, we're only just getting started!

We hope you enjoy seeing these amazing places as much as we enjoyed capturing them.

Thanks for joining us on this journey!
